variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

dependencies.name: perl
dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.

dependencies.name: perl-cpan-meta-check
dependencies.description:
This module verifies if requirements described in a CPAN::Meta object
are present..

dependencies.name: perl-dist-checkconflicts
dependencies.description: Declare version conflicts for your dist

dependencies.name: perl-file-sharedir
dependencies.description: File::ShareDir - Locate per-dist and per-module shared files

dependencies.name: perl-ipc-system-simple
dependencies.description: Run commands simply, with detailed diagnostics

dependencies.name: perl-namespace-autoclean
dependencies.description: Namespace::Autoclean - Keep imports out of your namespace

dependencies.name: perl-params-validationcompiler
dependencies.description:
Params::ValidationCompiler - Build an optimized subroutine parameter
validator once, use it forever

dependencies.name: perl-path-tiny
dependencies.description:
This module provides a small, fast utility for working with file paths.
It is friendlier to use than File::Spec and provides easy access to
functions from several other core file handling modules. It aims to be
smaller and faster than many alternatives on CPAN, while helping people
do many common things in consistent and less error-prone ways.

dependencies.name: perl-specio
dependencies.description: Type constraints and coercions for Perl .

dependencies.name: perl-test-file-sharedir
dependencies.description: Create a Fake ShareDir for your modules for testing.

dependencies.name: perl-test2-suite
dependencies.description: Distribution with a rich set of tools built upon the Test2 framework.

dependent_to.name: lcov
dependent_to.description:
LCOV is a graphical front-end for GCC's coverage testing tool gcov. It
collects gcov data for multiple source files and creates HTML pages
containing the source code annotated with coverage information. It also
adds overview pages for easy navigation within the file structure. LCOV
supports statement, function and branch coverage measurement.

dependent_to.name: perl-datetime
dependent_to.description: DateTime - A date and time object for Perl

dependent_to.name: perl-datetime-format-strptime
dependent_to.description: Parse and format strp and strf time patterns
